name: Adventures in AI Tourism
description:
The year is 30XX, space travel has become advanced and communication with alien species has been realized. It has been 70 years since the Grand war against the great dictator Augustus IX, who had threatened to overtake large sections of the colonized galaxies. Since then, it has become peaceful enough to the point where leisurely travel across various planets has become normalized. You, the tourists, are invited to try out a cruise from a newly formed touring company offering top of the line automated ships and a 100% satisfaction guaranteed policy. However, what you don’t know is that the touring company has repurposed old wreckage from the Grand war and has rebranded the warships as their own. Luckily, the modifications they have made the ships completely safe to ride on. Now, you have to navigate various planets in order to accomplish your goals, all while trying to avoid the gaze from the ship’s old AI who might still hold vengeance for what they've done to them. 

The game contains:
10 Planet Cards: 2 of each in the planet pdf (Not counting the back of the card)
60 Event Cards: 20 of each on the event pdf (Not counting the back of the card)
8 Character Cards: 1 Iman Cognito, 1 Venus the Rooted, 2 Zigzag the Great, 2 Grunk, 2 Flora Keeneyed

The game is a 1v3-4 deception game, where 3-4 players (Tourists) are pitted against 1 player (AI) on a tour across the galaxy. The tourists must be careful in what actions they take, or else risk attracting the eyes of the AI.

The rules sheet is designed to fold like a pamphlet, I recommend folding it into fours for the best experience.
